summary: Completed P0 feature testing for RAJA Digital System v1.0. All 25 backend tests passed (100%). All new features working: (1) Searchable driver input with real-time filtering (2) Date picker with 7-day ahead limit (3) Sheet selection buttons (4) Thermal printer ESC/POS download (.bin file) (5) Fixed bar chart rendering (converted from Pie to progress bars). Frontend UI tested across Admin and SuperAdmin dashboards.

ui_bugs.issue: HTML hydration warning: motion.tr inside tbody generates <span> wrapper causing invalid HTML structure. Console shows 'In HTML, <tr> cannot be a child of <span>'. Visually works but semantically invalid.

action_items: LOW PRIORITY: Fix Framer Motion motion.tr in tbody - use motion(tr) with AnimatePresence or wrap rows differently to avoid invalid HTML nesting. This is a minor hydration warning and doesn't affect functionality.
seed_data_creation: Used existing seeded data + created new SIJ transactions during testing (driver022, driver023)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 features implemented and tested successfully. Backend 100% passing. Frontend features all working: (1) Admin login redirects to Admin dashboard showing SIJ Shift, Revenue Shift, Driver Aktif, Mismatch table, Recent SIJ. (2) SuperAdmin login redirects to SuperAdmin dashboard showing 4 KPI cards (SIJ Hari Ini, Revenue Hari Ini, Driver Aktif, Proyeksi Bulan), 3 charts (SIJ per Shift as progress bars, Revenue per Admin bar chart, Tren SIJ 7 Hari line chart), Driver Ranking table, Mismatch table with Suspend buttons. (3) SIJ Input page has searchable driver input (filter by name/ID/plate/phone), date picker (7-day limit working), sheet selection buttons 1-7, QRIS reference input, auto-filled Admin/Shift. (4) After SIJ submission, success card shows Transaction ID, Print Browser and Download ESC/POS buttons. ESC/POS downloads valid .bin file with proper thermal printer commands.

tested_features.login_admin: PASS - admin1@raja.id / admin123 redirects to Admin dashboard
tested_features.login_superadmin: PASS - superadmin@raja.id / superadmin123 redirects to SuperAdmin dashboard
tested_features.superadmin_charts: PASS - SIJ per Shift (progress bars), Revenue per Admin (bar chart), Tren SIJ 7 Hari (line chart) all display correctly
tested_features.superadmin_kpi_cards: PASS - 4 KPI cards showing correct data
tested_features.sij_searchable_driver: PASS - Type 'Ahmad' shows filtered dropdown with driver details
tested_features.sij_date_picker: PASS - Calendar opens, today to 7 days ahead selectable
tested_features.sij_sheet_buttons: PASS - Buttons 1-7 clickable, selected state shows amber color
tested_features.sij_submission: PASS - Creates SIJ with transaction ID, shows success card
tested_features.sij_print_browser: PASS - Button present on success card
tested_features.sij_download_escpos: PASS - Downloads .bin file with valid ESC/POS commands
